YoutubeMetadata.title: MCB4 October 2020 Business License \u0026 Permits Committee
YoutubeMetadata.shortDescription:
Business Licenses & Permits Committee  
Tuesday, October 13, 2020 

6:30 p.m. 

 ALTERATION APPLICATIONS:
1. 401 W 53rd Street – Omakase LLC (change to hours of operation) Hours of Operation: 11 a.m. – 11 p.m. seven days a week; Capacity: 75; Tables: 11; Seats: 25; Service-only Bars: 0; Stand-Up Bars: 0 with 0 seats.  

 

2. 351 W 38th Street (8/9) – Quadrum 38 F&B LLC & GG W38 LLC (change to method of operation and an alteration to add interior restrooms to the rooftop area) Please see page 6, 7 & 18 of the packet for details for Hours of Operation; Capacity; Tables; Seats; Service-only Bars; Stand-Up Bars.  

 

NEW WINE, BEER & CIDER LICENSE APPLICATIONS: 

3. 366 W 52nd Street (8/9) – Toribro Ramen Inc 
Hours of Operation: 12 p.m. – 11 p.m. seven days a week; Capacity: 50; Tables: 5; Seats: 10; Service-only Bars: 0; Stand-Up Bars: 1 with 10 seats.    

NEW LIQUOR WINE, BEER & CIDER LICENSE APPLICATIONS: 

4. 142 W 24th Street - NY 24th Street Manager VI LLC, NY 24th Street Operating VI LLC and NY 24th Street VI LLC 
Hours of Operation: Hotel will operate 24 hours 7 days a week with alcohol service from noon to 1 a.m.; Capacity: 1,257; Tables: 52; Seats: 212; Service-only Bars: 0; Stand-Up Bars: 1 with 19 seats.  

 5. 155 7th Avenue (19) – Blackwave 155 7Ave LLC  
Hours of Operation: 7 a.m. – 10 p.m. Sunday – Thursday, 7 a.m. – 11 p.m. Friday & Saturday; Capacity: 56; Tables: 15; Seats: 25; Service-only Bars: 0; Stand-Up Bars: 1 with 4 seats. 

 6. 328-330 W 46th Street (8/9) – Time Square 46 Restaurant Corp.  
Hours of Operation: 12 p.m. – 2 a.m. seven days a week; Capacity: 120; Tables: 40; Seats: 120; Service-only Bars: 0; Stand-Up Bars: 1 with 8 seats. 

7. 331 W 51st Street – Corp to be formed by Michael Mestro –  
Hours of Operation: 11 a.m. – 12 a.m. seven days a week; Capacity: 100; Tables: 46; Seats: 68; Service-only Bars: 1; Stand-Up Bars: 1 with 12 seats. Seating outside within property line: 4 tables, 8 seats.  

 8. 319 W 51st Street – Kevin Empire Restaurant 319 Corp –  
Hours of Operation: 11 a.m. – 11 p.m. Sunday – Wednesday, 7 a.m. – 12 a.m. Thursday - Saturday; Capacity: 45; Tables: 10; Seats: 34; Service-only Bars: 0; Stand-Up Bars: 1 with 4 seats. Rear Yard: Capacity: 36; Tables: 9; Seats: 36; Front Patio: Tables: 4, Seats: 8.
